title: Requirements: agent-availability-enforcement-migration
five_acts: Act I - Regression Trigger: runtime agent routing could still launch unavailable agents through explicit and implicit paths.
Act II - Canonical Policy: added a shared core resolver for known/enabled/availability/degraded enforcement.
Act III - Surface Migration: API, daemon, command handlers, adapters, cron, and mapper paths were moved onto the same routing contract.
Act IV - Fail-Closed Hardening: review uncovered fail-open behavior on availability lookup errors and the fix enforced fail-closed routing.
Act V - Delivery Evidence: targeted and full test gates plus demo validation passed before finalize and logging cleanup.
